SEARCH
Package org.opengrok.indexer.analysis

Class OGKTextField

java.lang.Object
org.apache.lucene.document.Field
org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.OGKTextField
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.lucene.index.IndexableField
public class OGKTextField extends org.apache.lucene.document.Field
Represents an OpenGrok-customized tokenized text field to centralize settings across all the analyzers.
